snippet: The NADA fair, simultaneous with the Frieze art fair, features plenty of painting and sculpture from lesser-known galleries.
abstract: Karen Rosenberg reviews NADA NYC, art fair organized by the New Art Dealers Alliance.
lead_paragraph: The NADA fair, simultaneous with the Frieze art fair, features plenty of painting and sculpture from lesser-known galleries.

headline.seo: The NADA Art Fair in Chelsea
headline.main: Another Fair Makes a Debut, and Aims to Lure the Collectors Already in Town
headline.print_headline: Another Fair Makes a Debut, and Aims to Lure the Collectors Already in Town
